text: vētattai uṭaiyōril evarkaḷ nirākarittuk koṇṭiruntaṉarō, avarkaḷai avarkaḷuṭaiya vīṭukaḷiliruntu mutal veḷiyēṟṟattil veḷiyēṟṟiyavaṉ avaṉē, eṉiṉum avarkaḷ veḷiyēṟuvārkaḷ eṉṟu nīṅkaḷ niṉaikkavillai, avarkaḷum, taṅkaḷuṭaiya kōṭṭaikaḷ niccayamāka allāhvai viṭṭum taṅkaḷait taṭuttuk koḷpavai eṉṟu niṉaittārkaḷ; āṉāl, avarkaḷ eṇṇiyirāta puṟattiliruntu avarkaḷpāl allāh (vētaṉaiyaik koṇṭu) vantu avarkaḷuṭaiya itayaṅkaḷil pītiyaiyum pōṭṭāṉ, aṉṟiyum avarkaḷ tam kaikaḷālum muḥmiṉkaḷiṉ kaikaḷālum tam vīṭukaḷai aḻittuk koṇṭaṉar eṉavē akappārvaiyuṭaiyōrē! Nīṅkaḷ (itiliruntu) paṭippiṉai peṟuvīrkaḷāka
